questions.text: The federal government should eliminate national abortion laws, returning authority to individual states.
Immigration policies should be reformed to provide easier pathways for skilled workers and graduates of U.S. colleges.
The U.S. should prioritize diplomacy and avoid further NATO expansion to reduce tensions with Russia.
The government should implement a universal healthcare system, replacing the current private insurance model.
Climate change should be addressed through strict regulations on industries and significant investment in renewable energy.
The Second Amendment right to bear arms should be protected, with minimal federal restrictions on gun ownership.
The federal minimum wage should be significantly increased to keep pace with the cost of living.
The government should increase funding for law enforcement and take a tougher stance on crime.
Corporate tax rates should be lowered to stimulate economic growth and job creation.
